headline: Buy These Defensive Stocks After Beating Earnings Expectations?: ACI, JNJ
summary: Johnson & Johnson (JNJ) and Albertsons Companies' (ACI) stock have provided a pleasant hedge against market volatility and were able to exceed their quarterly expectations on Wednesday.

headline: Leadership Shakeup at Kroger (NYSE:KR) With New Appointments in Key Retail Roles
summary: Kroger (NYSE:KR) recently announced a series of executive changes, including the appointment of Joe Kelley as Senior Vice President of Retail Divisions. These changes highlight the company's focus on experienced internal leadership. Over the past quarter, Kroger's shares increased by 16%, possibly influenced by these internal adjustments, though it contrasts with the broader market's moderate movements during the same period. Other supportive factors could include the company's efforts in...

headline: Kroger names new SVP of retail divisions
summary: Joe Kelley, currently head of the grocer’s King Soopers & City Markets unit, replaces Kenny Kimball, who will return to his previous post as president of Smith’s.
